articles.title: Gold pares gains as stock markets climb, dollar steadies - Reuters India
articles.description: Gold prices staged a comeback on Monday, after paring gains earlier, as investors celebrated U.S. President Donald Trump's signing of a long-awaited pandemic aid bill that also weighed on the U.S. dollar.
